website_summaries.verdict: A stylish bamboo high chair that also folds up for easy storage and transportation.
pros: Adjusts to 3 different heights and has a weight limit of up to 77 pounds
Folds up if you need to store or transport it
Very sturdy and easy to clean
cons: Instructions to assemble the chair are confusing and there's no safety harness

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but small
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It takes a reallly long time to put together. And it’s smaller than I thought it was going to be by a lot. (I added a picture with the milk gallon to show you the size of the tray and chair as well as how my 6month old fits in it)
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: This product is not safe, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not safe. The tray is heavy, swings up and down without a safety mechanism and poses a risk. The tray arm are also too short for the tray to fit over an infants head nevermind an older child. Parts come damaged due to poor packaging. Update: The company just offered me $30 to remove my review. I stand by the review.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: There is no safety harness.
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with this chair esthetically and functionally.. Sturdy, I used it as a stool once and it held my weight. It takes some time to put together though, not a quick project because of all the parts/pieces. The directions are also pretty lousy but if you are slightly handy you should be able to figure it out. I wouldn’t recommend leaving your kiddo in it unattended though because there is no actual safety harness to keep them strapped in and seated.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair
customer_reviews.text: Some of the metal hardware looked weathered, but it's out of sight when put together. Assembly was fairly easy as well. It's sturdy, and we haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Skails

customer_reviews.title: Timeless look, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a ‘non plastic’, traditional design high chair to fit with our kitchen and searched forever for a true vintage option. This turned out to be a better option! So cute but also really study and so easy to clean so far. Exceeded expectations the last few months we’ve had it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: BMV

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a high chair that would fold small enough to accommodate our tiny kitchen, and have completely wipeable surfaces. I decided that if I was going to pay full price for a new highchair, I wanted to make sure that it was heirloom quality. This highchair is everything I wanted and more! It’s so cute, super durable, very well-made and easy to put together, and really easy to clean! I love it and I’m so glad that it something I’ll also be able to use for our next baby and plan to hold onto for our future grandbabies!
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chair
customer_reviews.text: love this highchair! I was looking for something that didn't look plastic and baby. I wanted something wooden are more antique looking. This is perfect. It was east to assemble, I did it myself with the tools and instructions provided (not sure why others had such a hard time). Our kiddo fits well in it. It slides up to the table nice. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: It works well for our 2,5 y old
customer_reviews.text: It’s not that easy to put together but it looks nice and doesn’t take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: One Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: My daughter weighs about 60 lbs and is 3 feet tall. The flip up tray cuts off at her neck. It's attached and there's no way to remove it without unscrewing it. Kind of ridiculous. If the tray had brackets on each side that the tray slid into and clicked - like a keekaroo - this high chair would be perfect. The keekaroo doesn't work for us because it doesn't fold like this one. It seems the perfect toddler high chair doesn't exist.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Look up installation video on YouTube.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as promised. Requires assembly and it was easy although it took me about an hour because the instructions aren't very clear in a couple steps. Other than that my son, daughter, wife and I love this chair so far.
customer_reviews.author: Genaro Mejia

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby items I ever got!
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 months of heavy usage this thing still looks brand new. It's the easiest thing to clean, super durable. Our girl is both tall and heavy for her age so her previous wooden chair completely fell apart within weeks of usage... It would be great if they offered some cushion to buy as a bundle too but it's easy enough to find it separately as well...
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: No edges :(
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just wish the tray had edges. Didn’t notice that until it arrived and was assembled. All his food falls off the edges :( really difficult to even give him food in it.. only good if we’re feeding him directly.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBills

customer_reviews.title: Cute, handy little chair
customer_reviews.text: We really do like this chair. It is just highly inconvenient that it comes with no safety straps. The straps we bought don't really fit on right, especially the bottom strap. We will have to drill a hole in the seat for proper fit. Hopefully the wood doesn't split. Also - get a silicone plate for this chair (the mini happy mat fits). You will need it if you want the food to spend more than a few seconds on the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and not durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a super tiny chair! Says it can fit up to 6 years old? In what world? This barely holds my 3 year old and she’s in the lower percentile of height and weight. It’s also easily damaged. I just set a piece down gently and it already has scratches. The style is pretty but it’s totally worthless. Now I have to return and wait to get a new chair...
customer_reviews.author: galbanolli

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. Putting together a little bit of a challenge. Pictures helpful but some difficulty in what direction some of the pieces should go. Had to take apart and switch a couple of times. Either...some close up pics or more marks on the wood...ie...front- back.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. I have a 6-month old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. I have a 6-month old daughter, chair is more than enough for her, I'm sure it will last for a couple of years. It is stall as to not be crouching to feed her, and most importantly it is durable. Downside is it takes about an hour if you're arming it by yourself, but if you like arming things like me then it's a joyride. Confident that this will be used by my future kids.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Cute little highchair, sturdy, collapsible, but dang is it a lot of pieces to put together
customer_reviews.text: Holy puzzle Batman! This is very time-consuming to put together! So many pieces and the directions don’t show the configuration very well. We had to take apart and reassemble certain areas Love the high chair, but definitely spend a few hours putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Bethany87

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk—broken piece
customer_reviews.text: returned this high chair—one of the main cross bar support pieces came cracked—noticed it before we got the chair completely together—and it is a total pain in the %#£\€}*%~ trying to get it together—no instructions, and AWFUL, tiny, unclear illustrations that don’t show ANY details. NOT IMPRESSED AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: j.  hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Plus and minus
customer_reviews.text: Darling highchair. I have two of them now. Nice that they fold up for easy storage for grandparents. BUT putting them together is a REAL challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure baby is buckled in
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted.. it's perfect for me the grandma when my new grandbaby comes over and I get to feed him.. it's just like a piece of furniture that blends in w/dining room
customer_reviews.author: rosemary garcia

customer_reviews.title: nice chair
customer_reviews.text: very nice chair and looks durable. was nicely varnished there were no any issues with the surface. i have one minor complaint, the sitting latch tab was by design too long so unable to fold down the seat, bending the tab did not work, i cut around 4mm from the end of the tab, now works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lajos Z D

customer_reviews.title: could use some kind of barrier
customer_reviews.text: Could use some kind of barrier to keep bowels and plates on tray. The wood does not allow suction to stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Minna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair Once Assembled
customer_reviews.text: The assembled high chair is very nice. My only complaint was the poor assembly instructions. I had assembled portions of the chair only to undo and reassemble with the parts in a different direction
customer_reviews.author: Dave5650

customer_reviews.title: no safety harness, hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Way too many pieces literally have to assemble EVERYTHING Strap is minimal and 1 torn off by a 1 year old Couldn’t find a harness to add got safety
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good size
customer_reviews.text: My 8 months daughter loves this highchair! This one is not too big and looks safe. But the instruction is kind of vague. They need to put more details.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Kim

customer_reviews.title: This high chair is pretty awful. We bought it for my sons 1st ...
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is pretty awful. We bought it for my sons 1st birthday but it didn’t align right, it was missing two screws and the seat belt didn’t even fit him. I was very upset because it had gotten good reviews and converted in to a toddler seat. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Maygen Huckaby

customer_reviews.title: Legs don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of the chair but the instructions were not very helpful also the back legs are not wide enough to go on so I can’t even use the high chair with the legs on it. I was so excited about this chair but now that I have it I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, both fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Sigh. These chairs are super cute, it not functional. They both fell apart. The screws got loose, the wood broke and you can’t lift the tray over the kid’s head, you have to physically lift them out. Both are getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Souvenir-Wiedemann

customer_reviews.title: Quality not good . Made from poor quality wood. Added pictures above for reference.
customer_reviews.text: I posted the pictures above. Today my daughter sat in the chair and it was broken. They put the wood together by using some glue and when I was assembling , I observed a crack . I am glad my daughter did not have any injury because of the exposed screws when my daughter fell down . I will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KBP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were just a little unclear, but helpful all the same. Sturdy once properly assembled. Happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gross

customer_reviews.title: Too many pieces..too tiny
customer_reviews.text: Way to many pieces to put together & the seat seemed like it was only big enough for a baby doll.
customer_reviews.author: Jennefir Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like its modern look. The one thing I don’t like about it is the quality of the wood finish. Most of the chair was finished well but there were areas that are facing the wall that had no stain.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Johnson

customer_reviews.title: wow. alresdy outgrown for original person. lucky there's already others for the seat
customer_reviews.text: very very good chair. light enough but very stable. so glad. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These high hairs are easy to put together, they are sturdy, and they are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ghosheh

customer_reviews.title: So unfortunately we are going to try to make the best of it with trying to fix it
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this highchair for my son and the wood for the tray came in split which we were going to try to fix but when we went to put the screw in it wouldn't catch..... So unfortunately we are going to try to make the best of it with trying to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it not to bulky and easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.author: pered2

customer_reviews.title: Good costumer service
customer_reviews.text: This ended up not being what I needed and the customer service was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: A Chil

customer_reviews.title: Quality suffers a bit...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute high chair. But there was a chunk of wood missing out of one piece and another piece splintered a bit. Baby is not very secure in it, even when buckled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daycare. I wanted something wood and something that could be folded up and stored. After several days of searching I decided to try this chair because it was significantly cheaper than any of the other wooden high chairs. I am very happy I did! Great quality for the price!! My one year old, three years old, and four year old fight over who gets to use it. I will definitely be purchasing more. The only downside was the time to assemble it but for the price and quality it’s definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Working fine for us as we wanted a highchair that would ...
customer_reviews.text: Working fine for us as we wanted a highchair that would not be too expensive and that would not make our small appartement feel crowded with a bigger model. I am posting pictures of the assembly instructions document to answer a customer question.
customer_reviews.author: Nono

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $81
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to try this high chair but sadly, it is a big disappointment. I can't imagine having to put this thing together. My husband did it - and thank goodness he has a drill. He said the hardware is cheap - and there is no straps to secure your baby. Which at first I thought I would just adjust the tray to hold them in tight. BUT, there is no adjusting of the tray. My babes would get out of this in a heartbeat. Hoping they let us return.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair but a waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful high chair but does not last long. My 13 month would shake and pull on table and he broke it. The screws fell out all the time my husband had to put them back but they still will fall out. I was super excited for the high chair but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: david wasicek

customer_reviews.title: I really like this baby high chair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this baby high chair, detailed wood finish with soft polish surface, very easy to clean. The tray design was convenience adjustable, I can feed my baby on the tray or flip it back to let my baby join the meal on the table. You can also adjust the height of the high chair, It's currently on the highest level for me, I think I can put it lower as my baby grow bigger. The high chair comes with plenty parts, but it's simple to assemble together. Good quality high chair, my baby is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Weitong Zhang

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED...SPLINTERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get to put this high chair together. Upon examining the pieces i got 2 splinters almost immediately. I would consider this a safety issue and would NOT recommend to anyone for their own child.
customer_reviews.author: MMN

customer_reviews.title: I suggest that the instructions be more detailed and mark ...
customer_reviews.text: I suggest that the instructions be more detailed and mark the pieces with letters or numbers to make it easier to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Osbaldo Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were poor however we managed to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: We've had this high chair for several months now. The instructions were poor however we managed to assemble it. The quality is good and it looks nice. It has more room than our previous high chair, which our toddler likes. It folds up for convenience/space saving. I just wish the table piece could lift up and open for better ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mg87

product_meta.title: ELENKER Bamboo High Chair for Baby Toddler, Foldable Wooden Highchair, 3 Gear Adjustable Height, Easy Clean
feature_bullets: Nature bamboo made, has characteristics of hygroscopic and endothermic
Foldable design, easy storage, and carry
Recommended range 6 months to 6 years old, up to 77 pounds
Assembly Required: comes with detailed assembly instructions, provide 24-hour email customer service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars116 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
